glsa.title: FileZilla: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in FileZilla, the worst of which could result in arbitrary code execution.

background.p: FileZilla is an open source FTP client.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in FileZilla. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious server, resulting in possible arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service. Additionally, a local attacker could read sensitive memory, potentially resulting in password disclosure.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All FileZilla users should upgrade to the latest version:
